name: Gravity (itch) (Miolosh)
description:
Gravity

Use gravity to your advantage to advance through the levels. By changing the direction of the gravity, your character will be able to navigate through the rooms. How fast can you move through the rooms?

Keybinds

Q or A - Move left
D - Move right
Z or W - Move Up
S - Move Down
J - turn gravity clockwise
K - turn gravity counterclockwise

Keybindings can be changed in the game options
